sentences.en: And all of us will pay an even steeper price if we allow this crisis to continue to deepen, a crisis which is unraveling homeownership, the middle class, and the American Dream itself.
sentences.cn: 如果我们允许这个危机继续恶化下去，我们所有的人将会付出更大的代价。 这个危机正在瓦解美国人对房屋的拥有权、中产阶级以及美国梦本身。

sentences.en: First, a bit of background: I worked in the Bush White House and wrote speeches - cited in the Times piece - where the president extolled the virtues of homeownership.
sentences.cn: 作为背景，我先说明一下，我在布什领导下的白宫工作，撰写讲话稿，有时候《时代》会引用一下，当总统赞美房产政策的时候。

sentences.en: Many members of Congress were worried less about financial about expanding access to homeownership.
sentences.cn: 相对于金融的稳定性,国会的很多议员更担心提供更多的住房机会的问题.

trans.tran_cn: 私房屋主，自己拥有住房者 (homeowner的变形)
